channel.title: What is the public boolean format?

item.title: What is the public boolean format?
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

i want to make a boolean for being on sara or zammy team. this is all i have so far:

[code] public boolean onSaraTeam() {
playerEquipment[playerCape] = 4041;
}

public boolean onZammyTeam() {
	playerEquipment[playerCape] = 4042;
	}

[/code]

what do i need to add to it to make it work?

thank you, R4ND0M

Read full topic
item.source: What is the public boolean format?
